content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5) - working (water: 100, temp: 15°C)
- Boiler (position: -6.0, 1.5) - out of fuel warning (water: 200, temp: 15°C)
- Steam engine (position: -1.5, 4.5) - not connected to power network
- Pipe network (3 pipes from pump to boiler, 4 pipes from boiler to engine)

### Iron Production Line at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5) - no power, chest full warning (38 iron ore in output)
- Wooden chest (position: 15.5, 72.5) - contains 38 iron ore
- Stone furnace (position: 16.0, 74.0) - working with 49 coal, contains 2 iron ore and 18 iron plates
- 3 Inserters (positions: 16.5,72.5; 17.5,74.5; 18.5,74.5) - all without power
- Assembling machine 2 (position: 21.5, 74.5) - no power, missing iron plates for gear production
- Output chest (position: 19.5, 74.5) - empty
- Small electric poles providing power coverage (though currently not functioning)

### New Electricity Groups
Multiple disconnected electricity groups detected at:
- (30.5,32.5) with 3 poles
- (50.5,54.5) with 1 pole
- (100.5,104.5) with 1 pole
- (150.5,154.5) with 2 poles
- (200.5,204.5) with 1 pole
- (300.5,300.5) with 2 poles

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement Errors (12 new instances)
- Occupied tiles: Verify tile is empty before placing (occurred at (198.5,200.5), (298.5,300.5), (20.5,74.5))
- Water placement: Check terrain type before placing (electric mining drills in water)
- Distance limitations: Move within 10 tiles before placing (occurred at (20.5,70.5) and (300.5,300.5))

### Power System Issues
- Boiler fuel depletion: Still not addressed (now at 48 coal remaining)
- Electrical network: Steam engine still not connected to power network
- Production halted: All electric devices remain without power

### Area Clearing Problems (4 new instances)
- Failed assertions: "Area not cleared properly" errors when trying to build
- Entity removal: Failed to remove stone furnace at (16.0,74.0) and electricity group at (20.5,70.125)

### Code Execution Errors
- Missing imports: 'math' module not imported before use
- Position validation: Assertions failing due to uncleared areas

### Production Chain Issues
- Iron ore backlog: Chest at (15.5,72.5) still full with 38 ore
- Assembler starvation: No progress on gear production
- Resource imbalance: 21 iron plates now accumulated in furnace

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- `find_empty_position()` -> Position: Attempts to find an empty position for placement (failed due to uncleared areas)
- `clear_area(position: Position, radius: float)` -> bool: Tries to clear area before building (failed assertions in multiple cases)

### Important Variables
- `entities_remaining: List[Entity]` - Tracks uncleared entities
- `empty_pos: Position` - Stores found empty positions (when successful)
